Package models

Class FarmModel

java.lang.Object
models.FarmModel
public class FarmModel extends Object
This class is the model for the farm. It contains helper methods to retrieve and set data as well as housing the masterlist of plants.

  • Method Details

    • getAdjacentTilesStates

      public ArrayList<State> getAdjacentTilesStates(Coordinate coord)
      Gets the state of all adjacent tiles to the given coordinate.
      Parameters:
      coord - the coordinate of the tile
      Returns:
      an arraylist of states of the adjacent tiles if the tile is not on the edge, else it returns an empty arraylist.
